title: Introducing Wharf: SessionKit & Overview
description: Learn about EOS' new JavaScript SDK, and how it can help you build better web3 apps!

episodes.title: Wharf Overview
episodes.description: Get a primer about the Wharf SDK before diving deeper

possible_answers.b: Helps you interact with custom contracts

possible_answers.a: Helps you interact with the system contracts
possible_answers.c: Helps you interact with custom contracts

episodes.title: What is a session?
episodes.description: Dig into what a session is, and why it's important

questions.text: What do you authenticate against in blockchain?
When do you need to do an authenticated request?

possible_answers.a: When you need to read data from the blockchain
possible_answers.b: When you need to sign a transaction

episodes.title: Session composition
episodes.description: Learn about the different parts of a session

questions.text: What are the components of a session?

possible_answers.a: Something that can sign a transaction and return a signature
possible_answers.b: Something that can sign docusign documents
possible_answers.c: Someone who signs off on your work

episodes.title: How to make a session
episodes.description: Learn how to make a session

questions.text: What are the two ways to make a session?

possible_answers.b: Either manually, or by logging a user into the SessionKit

questions.text: Can you connect to many blockchains at once?

episodes.title: Integrating wharf in a web app
episodes.description: Watch a demo of how to integrate wharf into a web app

questions.text: What SessionKit method do you call to login a user?
What SessionKit method do you call to send a transaction to the blockchain?

episodes.title: Q&A Session
episodes.description: Learn from questions asked by the community

questions.text: Where are the best places to get support?

possible_answers.a: Github discussions, or wharf telegram group
possible_answers.b: Calling Aaron on his landline at 2:17 am

questions.text: Does wharf store any harmful information in the browser?
